description:
TL;DR: Get hands-on with AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, and GPT-4, and more with these courses on sale for $24.97 through October 27.

AI is taking over the world — but don’t worry, you can still be in charge. With this ChatGPT and Gemini AI course bundle for $25, you’ll learn to harness the power of AI.

This course dives into the generative AI fundamentals, giving you the skills to use tools like ChatGPT, Gemini AI, GPT-4, and even DALL-E 2 for text, image, video, and audio creation. Why waste time on manual task
title: Take charge of AI before it takes over your job
